title: FS: ca. 1920 Columbia University Baseball Field Postcard
author: IronHorse2130

posts.post_title: FS: ca. 1920 Columbia University Baseball Field Postcard
posts.post_content:
A nice, unused postcard showing Columbia University's baseball field. Circa 1920 when Lou Gehrig played there.

$12 shipped in the United States. Please email or PM me if interested.
